scenarios.description: Find all functions that call a specific function
scenarios.prompt: Find all functions that call the function that finds a user by their ID in this codebase. Return the list of callers with their file locations.

scenarios.description: Find all classes that implement a specific interface
scenarios.prompt: Find all classes that implement the repository interface for managing users. Return the list with file paths.

scenarios.description: Analyze the impact of modifying a class or function
scenarios.prompt: Analyze the impact of modifying the domain model representing a user. Find all code that would be affected by changes to this class, including direct and indirect dependents. Return the impact analysis.

scenarios.description: Analyze all dependencies of a class (incoming and outgoing)
scenarios.prompt: Analyze all dependencies of the use case that handles user login. Find what it depends on (imports, injections) and what depends on it (usages). Return the dependency graph.

scenarios.description: Trace the call chain between two functions
scenarios.prompt: Trace the call chain from the function that retrieves a user by ID to the function that saves data to the database. Find if there's a path of function calls connecting these two functions. Return the call chain if it exists.
